data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Krasnoyarsk.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Krasnoyarsk, Russia

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 2,845,900 people living in the state of Krasnoyarsk.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Krasnoyarsk, Russia to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 1,597,352 people in the state of Krasnoyarsk who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Evenki people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, you gave the church of Krasnoyarsk, Russia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Krasnoyarsk to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 41,648 believers in the state of Krasnoyarsk to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

location.name: Krasnoyarsk
